data.name: EmailRequired
data.value: An e-mail address is required.

data.name: ValidEmailRequired
data.value: A valid e-mail address is required.

data.name: UserIdRequired
data.value: An user ID is required.

data.name: TokenRequired
data.value: A token is required.

data.name: NewPasswordRequired
data.value: A new password is required.

data.name: MinimumPasswordLength
data.value: A password must have at least 8 characters.

data.name: UsernameRequired
data.value: An username is required.

data.name: MinimumUsernameLength
data.value: An username must have at least 3 characters.

data.name: PasswordRequired
data.value: A password required.

data.name: CurrentPasswordRequired
data.value: The current password is required.

data.name: RoleRequired
data.value: A role must be defined.

data.name: EmailAlreadyInUse
data.value: The requested e-mail is already in use.

data.name: InvalidCredentials
data.value: Invalid credentials, please try again.

data.name: PasswordsMustBeEqual
data.value: The passwords must be equal.

data.name: EmailsMustBeEqual
data.value: The e-mails must be equal.

data.name: CannotProceedAlreadyInstalled
data.value: The installation cannot proceed because the application is already installed.

data.name: UserNotFound
data.value: The specified user was not found.

data.name: UserUpdateIsLastAdministrator
data.value: This user could not be updated because the role cannot be changed since this user is the last administrator.

data.name: UsernameAlreadyInUse
data.value: The requested Username is already in use.

data.name: PostMustHaveTitle
data.value: A post must have a title.

data.name: PostMustHaveContent
data.value: A post must have content.

data.name: PostNotFound
data.value: The specified post was not found.

data.name: PostNameAlreadyExist
data.value: A post with the specified name already exists.

data.name: UserDeleteIsLastAdministrator
data.value: This user could not be delete because this user is the last administrator.

data.name: TitleNotFound
data.value: The specified title was not found.

data.name: TitleNameAlreadyExist
data.value: A title with the specified name already exists.

data.name: TitleMustHaveName
data.value: A title must have a name.

data.name: TitleMustHaveAuthor
data.value: A title must have an author.

data.name: TitleMustHaveArtist
data.value: A title must have an artist.

data.name: TitleNameMaxLength
data.value: The name of the title must not surpass 200 characters.

data.name: TitleOriginalNameMaxLength
data.value: The original name of the title must not surpass 200 characters.

data.name: TitleAuthorMaxLength
data.value: The name of the author must not surpass 50 characters.

data.name: TitleArtistMaxLength
data.value: The name of the artist must not surpass 50 characters.

data.name: InvalidCoverFormat
data.value: The format used for the cover page is not supported. Please use PNG or JPG/JPEG.

data.name: ChapterNumberAlreadyExist
data.value: A chapter with the specified number already exists for the specified title.

data.name: ChapterMustHavePages
data.value: A chapter must have pages.

data.name: ChapterNotFound
data.value: The specified chapter was not found.

data.name: InvalidPagesFormat
data.value: The format of the file used to send the pages is not supported. Please pack your pages into a single ZIP file.

data.name: ChapterNameMaxLength
data.value: The name of the title must not surpass 100 characters.

data.name: ChapterMustHaveNumber
data.value: A chapter must have a number.

data.name: SiteNameRequired
data.value: A name for this site is required.

data.name: SiteAddressRequired
data.value: The current address used to access this site is required.

data.name: SmtpServerRequired
data.value: An address to the SMTP server is required.

data.name: SmtpServerPortRequired
data.value: A port for the SMTP server is required.

data.name: ReCaptchaClientKeyRequired
data.value: ReCaptcha requires a client key.

data.name: ReCaptchaServerKeyRequired
data.value: ReCaptcha requires a server key.

data.name: DiscordLinkRequired
data.value: A link to a discord server is required.

data.name: PostTitleMaxLength
data.value: The title of the post must not surpass 100 characters.

data.name: SmtpServerPortOutOfRange
data.value: The SMTP server port must be a value between 0 and 65535.

data.name: ValidEmailRequiredSiteEmail
data.value: A valid e-mail address is required to be used as an e-mail address for the site.

data.name: DiscordLinkValidUrl
data.value: The address to the discord server must be a valid URL.

data.name: PatreonLinkValidUrl
data.value: The address to the patreon page must be a valid URL.

data.name: KofiLinkValidUrl
data.value: The address to the kofi must be a valid URL.

data.name: SiteEmailRequired
data.value: A e-mail address for this site is required.

data.name: PatreonLinkRequired
data.value: An address to a Patreon page is required.

data.name: KoFiLinkRequired
data.value: An address to a KoFi page is required.

data.name: AboutUsPageContentRequired
data.value: The About Us page requires content.
